author: felicity
msg: bug 1706: when bayes was expiring tokens, it would check to see if there
were enough tokens left at the end and reprieve tokens if necessary.
however, the reprieval was happening in a random order, so the oldest
tokens would likely be left in the DB.  the code will now sort the tokens
by atime and reprieval the most recently used tokens first.

author: jmason
msg: bug 1799: REPORT verb ignores local config
